text: Bert Ira Gordon (September 24, 1922 - March 8, 2023) was an American movie maker. He made many movies that are science fiction. He made his first movie when he was 32 in 1955, called King Dinosaur. In the movie, a group of astronauts go to another planet and find lots of strange creatures. In an interview with Shout! Factory, he explained he always wanted to make movies ever since one of his relatives gave him a video camera. Gordon had a daughter, Susan. She was a child actor. She even starred in Bert's movie, Tormented. Gordon died on March 8, 2023 at a hospital in Los Angeles, California at the age of 100. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American movie directors Category:American screenwriters Category:People from Kenosha, Wisconsin
